name: Rena
description:
Rena is lost in life. Working a dead-end career as middle management, her life is a cycle of meetings and deadlines. Then one day, she meets a little spirit who rekindles her artistic talents. Armed with her daily planner and scrapbook from the past, embark on a whimsical journey in self-discovery!

Controls:
  • Use mouse + click to interact
  • Click the bottom-right corner of the book to turn to the next page
